name: Pokémon Insurgence
storyline: Meet the Torren region, a Pokemon land devastated by war and crime. Organization nicknamed as "Cults" run this region: they have the only purpose of adoring Pokemons in one way or another. A man, called Agur, came to Torren and destroyed half of the cults, with only five remaining, before disappearing without a trace. Another man proclaim to follow the Agur's legacy and destroy the cults.One year has passed. You wake up in the prison of the Darkrai Cult. Mew comes to your rescue. You don't remember anything.
summary: A brand new Pokémon adventure based in the Torren Region! Pokemon Insurgence is a fangame for the Pokemon series based in a brand new region with fun mechanics such as Delta Pokemon, Armored Pokemon, secret bases, online trading, character customization and so much more!
